channel.title: What is the eqivalent of obsfucation for other languages+other questions
channel.description:
Is it still called obsfucation?And if I'm not wrong then obsfucation makes things read only,correct?
Another question:How do you find out what programming language a game is made in if its read only and does not tell you?
What sort of file extensions are these? .dll .erl .ver
Im thinking of hacking maplestory...
Thanks for your time

item.title: What is the eqivalent of obsfucation for other languages+other questions
item.dc:creator: @the_one1 the one
item.description:
@the_one1 wrote:

kinda
So actually we edit the client to cheat?Thats kinda crappy.But,its like using clients,what not?
And cheats are heavily moddified clients right?

Urm,how do you view something in file formats you don’t know about?

This may sound stupid but how do I get into ASM?

Read full topic

item.title: What is the eqivalent of obsfucation for other languages+other questions
item.dc:creator: @the_one1 the one
item.description:
@the_one1 wrote:

Hmm,this thing has GameGuard,almost like a firewall,but almost useless.
You can create items,like item duping,short of duping part,using a hack
You can also have god mode,(like dark side,which gives you powers of non-atackabillity,but unfortuantely you also cannot attakc)without being a thief…

I would have a .pwnd. You know what? I’m going to use that in my next application, if I ever make one. It’ll be read like a .txt, but it’ll be a .pwnd.

item.title: What is the eqivalent of obsfucation for other languages+other questions
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

Asm is Assembly, the closest you’ll get to actual machine code without touching it.

dll - Dynamic Link Library

I don’t konw about the two others.

Read full topic
